item.title: Making Spawning For All Players In CheezScape Pkz Source? Help?
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

Hm, i managed to figure out how to make it for just me, since it’s like:

} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Eric”)) {

but i’m wondering how i could make it for everyone, thanks. Do i just delete && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Eric”))?

Sorry, yeah it’s a nab question.
Damn, turns out it didn’t work >_<…
Even for me.

Read full topic
